response.job_title: Systems' Engineer currently working at Devsu LLC
response.summary:
I've mainly worked with Spring boot + Angular, but I'm always open to learn whatever I can (recently I've been reading about microservices, clean code and Test Driven Development).

I love working with graphics too. 2D images and 3D modeling (using tools like Photoshop, Illustrator and Blender).

My hobbies are playing guitar, videogames, drawing and reading a lot. I also play football sometimes.
response.skills: Openshift, Apache Camel, Amazon EKS, Spring Framework, Go, JavaScript, Spring Boot, Twilio, PL/SQL, Ruby on Rails, Java, Python, C++, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Power BI, Matemáticas, GitHub, Docker, Arquitectura de software, Desarrollo de software

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de componentes y buses de integración, utilizando herramientas como: Apache Camel, IBM API Connect, OpenShift, entre otras.
profile_positions.title: Desarrollador de integración SOA

education.field_of_study: Desarrollo gráfico de proyectos de construcción

company.name: PRAGMA
company.description:
Pragma is a Custom Software Development and Digital Transformation company founded 27 years ago to improve people's lives by transforming businesses. 

We have operations in the USA, Central and South America, and two development hubs in Colombia and Peru. Our more than 1,300 pragmatics have delivered over 700 projects for 150+ clients across the continent.



We make the transformation possible through our boutique’ client and business obsession and the capabilities of a Big Tech.

We work with our clients, providing best-in-class teams with an outstanding service level to boost their impact and growth, with Tech Teams passionate about their business, the customer, and technology.



Our teams have vast experience solving different kinds of challenges:

Systems Integrations 
Cloud
Data Science
Design and experience
Software development
Consulting services
Process digitalization
Digital commerce


We work under a Nearshore model, which allows us to deliver great results while helping our clients keep growing and streamline their resources. 



Keep Moving. Let’s talk!
hello@pragma.co
